tweet:
Ex-cop Derek Chauvin, charged for murdering #GeorgeFloyd, was charged with 9 counts of tax evasion.

He and his wife allegedly did not report $464K in income since 2014, incl. money he made working off-duty security.

Each new charge is punishable with up to 5 years in prison.
